Key Match Events: Machado blasted a game-tying homer off Astros starter Hunter Brown
Post-Match Reflections: Profar took his base after the controversial non-hit-by-pitch call
Machado said thanks to the umpire for giving him the opportunity to hit a game-tying homer
This is what postseason baseball's all about, Machado said
Miscellaneous Highlights: Profar was upset about the non-hit-by-pitch call
The game had a playoff atmosphere
The Padres missed the opportunity to cut their deficit to 2.5 games behind the Dodgers in the NL West
